. This coastal town is very popular with foreign tourists and also the locals. It has a huge quantity of hotels and shops next to the beach.

Wide range, many fish dishes. The local dish famous in this region is Rissotto.

Lido di Jesolo has an abundance of restaurants of different styles.
There are many discos to visit.
Jesolo has a well developed tourist infrastructure with countless hotels, residence, bed and breakfast, apartments, aparthotel and rooms for rent.

Four star hotel, a member of the Worldhotels First Class Collection International chain. It faces the Adriatic Sea, and has a private beach.

Around the Venetian lagoon are other smaller islands, which have since been deserted but are worth a visit.  There is also the Lido, which is a long narrow island with more modern buildings, hosting a youth hostel and a hotel.
